title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 6 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 6 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O LORD, rebuke me not in thine anger, neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你不要在怒中责备我，也不要在烈怒中惩罚我。

lineList.en: Have mercy upon me, O LORD; for I am weak: O LORD, heal me; for my bones are vexed.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你可怜我。因为我软弱。耶和华阿，求你医治我。因为我的骨头发战。

lineList.en: My soul is also sore vexed: but thou, O LORD, how long?
lineList.cn: 我心也大大的惊惶。耶和华阿，你要到几时才救我呢。

lineList.en: Return, O LORD, deliver my soul: oh save me for thy mercies' sake.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你转回，搭救我。因你的慈爱拯救我。

lineList.en: For in death there is no remembrance of thee: in the grave who shall give thee thanks?
lineList.cn: 因为在死地无人记念你，在阴间有谁称谢你。

lineList.en: I am weary with my groaning; all the night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears.
lineList.cn: 我因唉哼而困乏。我每夜流泪，把床榻漂起，把褥子湿透。

lineList.en: Mine eye is consumed because of grief; it waxeth old because of all mine enemies.
lineList.cn: 我因忧愁眼睛乾瘪。又因我一切的敌人眼睛昏花。

lineList.en: Depart from me, all ye workers of iniquity; for the LORD hath heard the voice of my weeping.
lineList.cn: 你们一切作孽的人，离开我吧。因为耶和华听了我哀哭的声音。

lineList.en: The LORD hath heard my supplication; the LORD will receive my prayer.
lineList.cn: 耶和华听了我的恳求。耶和华必收纳我的祷告。

lineList.en: Let all mine enemies be ashamed and sore vexed: let them return and be ashamed suddenly.
lineList.cn: 我的一切仇敌都必羞愧，大大惊惶。他们必要退后，忽然羞愧。
